name: IKImageEditPanel
desc: The IKImageEditPanel class provides a panel, that is, a utility window that floats on top of document windows, optimized for image editing.

items.name: class func shared() -> IKImageEditPanel!
items.desc: Creates a shared instance of an image editing panel.

items.name: var filterArray: [Any]!
items.desc: Returns the current array of user adjustments to effects.

items.name: func reloadData()
items.desc: Reloads the data from the data associated with an image editing panel.
